title: d'Alembert operator
summary: In special relativity, electromagnetism and wave theory, the d'Alembert operator (denoted by a box: â—» {\displaystyle \Box } ), also called the d'Alembertian, wave operator, box operator or sometimes quabla operator[1] (cf. nabla symbol) is the Laplace operator of Minkowski space. The operator is named after French mathematician and physicist Jean le Rond d'Alembert.
